about_the_game:
Embark on a perilous journey to the Forsaken Isles, a land that once brimmed with life and now echoes the tales of its fall. Amidst the chaos, a lone wizard rises against the tide of darkness, powered by the mystical Heart of the Isles. Join the fight in this enthralling top-down, twin-stick tower defense adventure, where survival is just the beginning.



A Land of Beauty and Despair
Imagine a paradise lost, the Forsaken Isles await you with open arms and hidden dangers. Once a haven of tranquility, now a battlefield where only the brave dare to tread. As a vacation spot, it's... unconventional. But for a hero like you? It's perfect.


Intense Combat and Strategic Defense
Inspired by the wave-based excitement of Plants vs Zombies and the addictive leveling system of Vampire Survivors, Paradise Defense Force offers a unique blend of action and strategy. Face hordes of enemies, each wave more challenging than the last, and stand your ground with cunning defenses and powerful spells.



Evolve and Conquer
Survival is just the beginning. Thrive in adversity by upgrading your wizard with a plethora of skills and abilities. Earn gold and experience from your fallen foes, unlock potent spells, and invest in game-changing upgrades. Every choice shapes your journey and your arsenal.


Epic Boss Fights
The path to salvation is guarded by formidable foes. Bosses of unimaginable power await at the end of key battles, scaling with your strength to offer a challenge worthy of legend. Triumph against these titans for rewards that could turn the tide of war.

Join the Adventure!

Paradise Defense Force is more than a game; it's a call to arms for those brave enough to reclaim a world on the brink. Will you answer the call? Will you be the beacon of hope in a land shrouded in darkness? Dive in and defend the Isles with all your might!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (or later)

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
